description: Honeypot configuration for cybersecurity research with multiple services and unique vulnerabilities.

services.cve_description: Webopac from Grand Vice info has a Reflected Cross-site Scripting vulnerability, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the user's browser through phishing techniques.

commands.handler: This is a honeypot service. No actions are permitted.

plugin.prompt: You have accessed a honeypot service. Please enter your command.

services.cve_description: The WP Smart Import plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘page’ parameter due to insufficient input sanitization.
Enabling Simple Ajax Uploader plugin in Laragon allows for a remote code execution (RCE) attack via improper input validation.

commands.handler: Invalid command. This is a honeypot.

plugin.prompt: You are connected to a honeypot SSH server. Please enter your command.

services.description: TCP honeypot for network service vulnerabilities.
services.cve_description: Weaknesses in the generation of TCP/UDP source ports in Google's gVisor allowed them to be predicted by an external attacker.
services.banner: Welcome to the TCP honeypot service.

services.description: TCP honeypot simulating a web plugin environment.
services.cve_description: The Dino Game plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to insufficient input sanitization.
services.banner: Welcome to the Dino Game TCP service.
